Verses: 1 yerobeyaam Thoobankaatta Palipeedaththandaiyile Nirkaiyil, Idho, Dhevanudaiya Manushan Oruvan Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Yoodhaavilirundhu Beththelukku Vandhu,

2 andha Palipeedaththai Nokki: Palipeedame Palipeedame, Idho, Dhaaveedhin Vamsaththil Yosiyaa Ennum Perulla Oru Kumaaran Pirappaan; Avan Unmel Thoobankaattugira Medaigalin Aasaariyargalai Unmel Paliyiduvaan; Manusharin Elumbugalum Unmel Sutterikkappadum Enbadhaik Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Koori;
3 andraiya Dhinam Avan Oru Adaiyaalaththaiyum Solli, Idho, Indhap Palipeedam Vediththu, Adhinmelulla Saambal Kottundupom; Karththar Uraiththadharku Idhuve Adaiyaalam Endraan.

4 beththelil Irukkira Andhap Palipeedaththirku Edhiraaga Dhevanudaiya Manushan Koorina Vaarththaiyai Raajaavaagiya Yerobeyaam Kettapodhu, Avanaip Pidiyungal Endru Than Kaiyaip Palipeedaththilirundhu Neettinaan; Avanukku Virodhamaai Neettina Kai Thannidamaaga Mudakkak Koodaadhapadikku Maraththuppoyitru.
5 dhevanudaiya Manushan Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaal Kuriththirundha Adaiyaalaththinpadiye Palipeedam Vediththu, Saambal Palipeedaththilirundhu Kottundupoyitru.

6 appozhudhu Raajaa, Dhevanudaiya Manushanukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Nee Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Samugaththai Nokki Vendikkondu, En Kai Mun Polirukkumpadikku Enakkaaga Vinnappampannavendum Endraan; Appozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Manushan Karththarudaiya Samugaththai Nokki Varundhi Vinnappam Seydhaan, Raajaavin Kai Munnirundhapadi Seerppattadhu.
7 appozhudhu Raajaa Dhevanudaiya Manushanai Nokki: Nee Ennodekooda Veettukku Vandhu Ilaippaaru; Unakku Vegumaanam Tharuven Endraan.
8 dhevanudaiya Manushan Raajaavai Nokki: Neer Enakku Ummudaiya Veettil Paadhi Koduththaalum, Naan Ummode Varuvadhillai, Indha Sthalaththil Appam Pusippadhumillai, Thanneer Kudippadhumillai.
9 enendraal Nee Appam Pusiyaamalum, Thanneer Kudiyaamalum, Ponavazhiyaaith Thirumbaamalum Iruvendru Karththar Thammudaiya Vaarththaiyaal Enakkuk Kattalaiyittirukkiraar Endru Solli,
10 avan Beththelukku Vandhavazhiyaaith Thirumbaamal, Veruvazhiyaaip Poivittaan.

11 kizhavanaana Oru Theerkkadharisi Beththelile Kudiyirundhaan; Avan Kumaarar Vandhu Dhevanudaiya Manushan Andraiya Dhinam Beththelile Seydha Ellaa Seygaigalaiyum, Avan Raajaavode Sonna Vaarththaigalaiyum Thangal Thagappanukku Ariviththaargal.
12 appozhudhu Avargal Thagappan: Avan Endha Vazhi Ponaan Endru Avargalaik Kettaan. Yoodhaavilirundhu Vandha Dhevanudaiya Manushan Ponavazhi Innadhendru Avan Kumaarar Paarththirundhapadiyaal,
13 avan Than Kumaararudane: Kazhudhaiyinmel Senamvaiththuk Kodungal Endraan; Avargal Kazhudhaiyinmel Senamvaiththuk Koduththapin, Avan Adhinmel Eri,

14 dhevanudaiya Manushanaith Thodarndhupoi, Oru Karvaali Maraththinkeezh Utkaarndhirukkira Avanaik Kandu: Yoodhaavilirundhuvandha Dhevanudaiya Manushan Neerdhaanaa Endru Avanaik Kettadharku; Avan, Naan Dhaan Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Avanai Nokki: Ennode Veettukku Vandhu Appam Pusiyum Endraan.
16 adharku Avan: Naan Ummode Thirumbavum Ummode Ulle Pogavumaatten; Indha Sthalaththile Ummode Naan Appam Pusikkavum Thanneer Kudikkavumaatten.
17 enendraal Nee Appam Pusiyaamalum, Ange Thanneer Kudiyaamalum, Nee Ponavazhiyaaith Thirumbivaraamalum Iru Endru Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaayirukkiradhu Endraan.

18 adharku Avan: Ummaippola Naanum Theerkkadharisidhaan; Avan Appam Pusiththuth Thanneer Kudikka, Nee Avanaith Thiruppi, Un Veettukku Azhaiththukkonduvaa Endru Oru Thoodhan Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaaga Ennode Sonnaan Endru Avanidaththil Poi Sonnaan.
19 appozhudhu Avan Ivanode Thirumbip Poi, Ivan Veettile Appam Pusiththuth Thanneer Kudiththaan.
20 avargal Pandhiyil Utkaarndhirukkirapodhu, Avanaith Thiruppikkonduvandha Theerkkadharisikkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaanadhinaal,
21 avan Yoodhaavilirundhu Vandha Dhevanudaiya Manushanaip Paarththu Saththamittu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Karpiththa Kattalaiyai Nee Kaikkollaamal Karththarudaiya Vaakkai Meeri,

22 appam Pusikkavum Thanneer Kudikkavum Vendaam Endru Avar Vilakkina Sthalaththirku Nee Thirumbi, Appam Pusiththuth Thanneer Kudiththapadiyinaal, Unnudaiya Predham Un Pidhaakkalin Kallaraiyile Seruvadhillai Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
23 avan Pojanabaanampanni Mudindhapinbu, Andhath Theerkkadharisiyaith Thiruppikkonduvandhavan Avanukkuk Kazhudhaiyinmel Senamvaiththuk Koduththaan.
24 avan Ponapirpaadu Vazhiyile Oru Singam Avanukku Edhirppattu Avanaik Kondrupottadhu; Avan Predham Vazhiyile Kidandhadhu; Kazhudhai Adhinandaiyile Nindradhu; Singamum Predhath Thandaiyile Nindradhu.

25 andha Vazhiye Kadandhuvarugira Manushar, Vazhiyile Kidakkira Predhaththaiyum, Predhaththandaiyile Nirkira Singaththaiyum Kandu, Kizhavanaana Theerkkadharisi Kudiyirundha Pattanaththile Vandhu Sonnaargal.

26 avanai Vazhiyilirundhu Thirumbap Pannina Theerkkadharisi Adhaik Kettapodhu, Avan Karththarudaiya Vaakkai Meerina Dhevanudaiya Manushan Thaan, Karththar Avanukku Sonna Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Karththar Avanai Oru Singaththirku Oppukkoduththaar; Adhu Avanai Muriththuk Kondrupottadhu Endru Solli,
27 than Kumaararai Nokki: Enakkuk Kazhudhaiyinmel Senamvaiththuk Kodungal Endraan; Avargal Senam Vaiththuk Koduththaargal.

28 appozhudhu Avan Poi, Vazhiyile Kidakkira Avan Predhaththaiyum, Predhaththandaiyile Kazhudhaiyum Singamum Nirkiradhaiyum Kandaan; Andha Singam Predhaththaith Thinnavumillai, Kazhudhaiyai Muriththuppodavumillai.

29 appozhudhu Kizhavanaana Andhath Theerkkadharisi Dhevanudaiya Manushanin Predhaththai Eduththu, Adhaik Kazhudhaiyinmel Vaiththu, Adharkaaga Dhukkankondaadavum Adhai Adakkampannavum, Adhaith Than Pattanaththirkuk Konduvandhu,
30 avan Predhaththaith Thannudaiya Kallaraiyile Vaiththaan. Avanukkaaga: Aiyo, En Sagodharane Endru Pulambi, Dhukkankondaadinaargal.

31 avanai Adakkampanninapinbu, Avan Than Kumaararai Nokki: Naan Marikkumpodhu, Dhevanudaiya Manushan Adakkampannappatta Kallaraiyile Ennaiyum Neengal Adakkampanni, Avan Elumbugalandaiyile En Elumbugalaiyum Vaiyungal.

32 avan Beththelil Irukkira Palipeedaththirkum, Samaariyaavin Pattanangalil Irukkira Medaigalaagiya Sagala Kovilgalukkum Virodhamaagak Koorina Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Nichchayamaai Niraiverum Endraan.

33 indha Nadapadikkuppinbu, Yerobeyaam Than Pollaadha Vazhiyaivittuth Thirumbaamal, Marupadiyum Janaththil Eenamaanavargalai Medaigalin Aasaariyaraakkinaan; Evan Mel Avanukku Manadhirundhadho Avanaip Pradhishtaippanninaan; Appadippattavargal Medaigalin Aasaariyaraanaargal.
34 yerobeyaamin Veettaarai Boomiyinmel Vaikkaamal Adhampanni Azhikkumpadiyaaga Indhak Kaariyam Avargalukkup Paavamaayitru.
